EmailTemplate.description: Email notification template used for rejection emails.
EmailTemplate.name: Master Data Rejection Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Master Data Rejected - {!jj_rb_Master_Data_Request__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Master Data Request - {!jj_rb_Master_Data_Request__c.Name} has been rejected.
Regards, Rebate Management Team
